page.title: 06Llanfihangel to Capel Seion
page.content: We are a family of three who moved to the area from England several years ago. We bought a small farmhouse in Pantycrug & converted one of the outbuildings to a television workshop & started a small TV sales/repairs business covering a 15 mile radius. Our son went to English speaking school in Aberystwyth & now studies computer science at Loughborough University. Our pastimes are walking, photography, sport, gardening & Womens Institute. Our son shares most of our interests & also enjoys cycling. The{travelling shop}calls once a week in Llanfihangel & along the main road from Pisgah to Capel Seion. The{ {milkman}calls every other day & the baker 3 times a week. A butcher calls at Llanfihangel once a week aswell. The nearest shop for both communities is at New Cross.
